title: Path of proton in magnetic field

content.question: A uniform magnetic field B is parallel to the xy-plane and in the +y-direction, as shown above. A proton p initially moves with velocity v in the xy-plane at an angle ùõ≥ to the magnetic field and the y-axis. The proton will subsequently follow what kind of path?

choices.label: A straight-line path in the direction of v
A circular path in the xy-plane
A circular path in the yz-plane
A helical path with its axis parallel to the y-axis
A helical path with its axis parallel to the z-axis

content.answer: A helical path with its axis parallel to the y-axis

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
